name: Norvan VT 2 Trail Running Shoe - Men's

features: Trail running performance with climbing and scrambling agiility
Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber compound is durable and grippy
TPU protection on the upper provides abrasion resistance
Forward eyelet placement creates a secure, confident fit
Durable EVA/Polyolefin blend midsole provides shock absorption and propulsion
Breathable mesh upper keeps feet cool and dries quickly
Mid-forefoot TPU film provides underfoot protection
Climbing zone at the forefoot designed for improved edging and better friction
EVA/Polyolefin blended midsole features higher abrasion component in the forefoot for scrambling
Toe cap adds protection and abrasion resistance
Integrated tongue pocket tucks away laces to prevent snags and untying
